mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into factories (name, logo_file_path, website_url, types, status, business_license_no, tax_registered_no, product_certification_path, business_license_path, tax_registered_path, created_at, updated_at, customer_id, description) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{businessLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCertificationPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicensePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegisteredPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update factories set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_file_path = #{logoFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website_url = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, business_license_no = #{businessLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_registered_no = #{taxRegisteredNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_certification_path = #{productCertificationPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license_path = #{businessLicensePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_registered_path = #{taxRegisteredPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, logo_file_path, website_url, types, status, business_license_no, tax_registered_no, product_certification_path, business_license_path, tax_registered_path, created_at, updated_at, customer_id, description from factories where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, name, logo_file_path, website_url, types, status, business_license_no, tax_registered_no, product_certification_path, business_license_path, tax_registered_path, created_at, updated_at, customer_id, description from factories
select * from factories f where f.status=#{param1}
